LanguageData.Apparel_konarmor.label: Kon armor
LanguageData.Apparel_konarmor.description:
A strange armor made from concrete that kons seem to take a liking to.
Due to the fact that it's made out of concrete, it's extremely heavy and hard to wear.
LanguageData.Apparel_konkasa.label: Kon ear hat
LanguageData.Apparel_konkasa.description: A hat with small holes to allow for ears. A tight fit, but better than nothing.
LanguageData.Apparel_siroarmor.label: Siro armor
LanguageData.Apparel_siroarmor.description: A weighted set of armor used by the wolf-eared siros. Helps train the body to endure much more strain due to the added weight.
LanguageData.Apparel_siroomen.label: Siro combat mask
LanguageData.Apparel_siroomen.description: A combat mask made and worn by the wolf-eared siros. These masks are usually painted in a fake blood to intimidate enemies.
LanguageData.Apparel_kuroomen.label: Kuro combat mask
LanguageData.Apparel_kuroomen.description: A combat mask made and worn by the the dog-eared kuros. Bears a minor resemblance to the wolf-eared siros.
